title: Feature request: Object detection model zoo
body_html: Are there any plans for an object detection model zoo like tensorflow has, with models like ssd, faster r-cnn, mask r-cnn, etc? I really like pytorch but am currently using tensorflow to avoid using unofficial/nonsupported model repos. An official object detection model zoo along with a standardized data format for bounding box/segmentation annotations would be amazing.

body: Are there any plans for an object detection model zoo like tensorflow has, with models like ssd, faster r-cnn, mask r-cnn, etc? I really like pytorch but am currently using tensorflow to avoid using unofficial/nonsupported model repos. An official object detection model zoo along with a standardized data format for bounding box/segmentation annotations would be amazing.
